title: I finished my flex placement then on 43th game i placed on different tier again??
body:
the new rank system placed me on 10th game, then it re-placed me after 43rd game ??

can somebody tell me whats going on

replies.body:
Seras, let me explain this to you, because your an incompetent riot employee who is probably related to someone that gave you the job. 

ITS A HARD RESET. IT WOULD BE LIKE IF WE ALL MADE NEW ACCOUNTS. RIOT EXPLAINED IT. I AND OTHER UNDERSTOOD. AND NOW YOUR FUCKING CHANGING IT FOR PLAT SCRUBS THAT FUCKED AROUND IN THEIR PLACEMENTS.

You seem to have misunderstood, I'm not a Riot employee I'm a volunteer on boards (i.e still a regular player like everyone else).

To the best of my knowledge, it was never said anywhere that it was a hard reset, I would very much like the source you got that from.

It was changed because things went horribly wrong.
Hey guys I know it's confusing, check the latest updates here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues

i think riot needs to notice us better than just put some articles on the forum.

for small issues it might possible but its the ranked issue what are you guys thinking?

They have all hands on deck (this isn't just an OCE problem) trying to find and push a fix for the problem as quickly as possible (and at the very least before the start of Season 7). This was always a test of the new queue, and clearly something has gone very wrong.

They knew something was up, so they told us. They pushed a fix that they were hoping would fix the issues for most if not all people, and they told us. When they have more information for us they will tell us, but as of now they have no new information for us.

This isn't a problem they can wave a magic wand at and make it go away, there's a lot of hard work involved here.

just wondering what if they put a note where we can find easily like how they still do " verify email now and get the ip boost" way.

very eyecatching popup

There's a little blue exclamation mark that displays notifications in client (top right legacy, top right beta). That's usually the best place to check first for game affecting notifications, but it sometimes takes a while for notification to up there.
i know what it is but i dont click it often because ur hiding it. if you want us to check it, rather open it or get bigger FONT SIZE.

Considering most major announcements are made on the forums, where else are they going to put it?

You don't look at the front page of the website, you likely don't pay attention to the client's ads.

i think i missed the clients ad on this topic though.

what if they dont use the forum at all? i wasnt a big fan of forum, im here to ask ppl whats going on with the tier problems.

and the riot guy came and "hey dude just read this article".  well... if something new is fuked up, then just let us know in easiest way to find out.  what if they put some note on  the client, 

like the way they tell us "HEY YOU VERIFY UR EMAIL NOW SO YOU CAN GET THE 4 IP BOOTSTS."

i mean, its bigger issue than earn 4 ip boosts right?

Because it doesn't work putting it in the client.
Patch Notes get put in the client and no one reads those do they? There are still idiots trying to do Season 5 Tank Fizz.

If you want to know what is happening with the game you need to seek out the information because Riot gave up trying to help the tards ages ago.
How does it make sense that I ranked flex my way to diamond 5 vsing high plats and diamonds and after playing one game I rank back down to silver 2?

It doesn't, but you have been consistently high Gold yes? Do you really think it made sense that you climbed to Diamond so quickly?

The whole of matchmaking and seeding is completely messed up, this change attempted to fix that and fell short for most people (at the very least most people here on boards).

They will update us when they have more info, but just at the moment preseason rank means pretty much nothing.
Read the info on the patch thismonring.
by the looks of it, nothing has been fixed lol
We need a rioter to explain the " change " in more detail.

To the best of my knowledge the idea was to realign people with what their ranks should be, as the preseason placements were completely and utterly borked. Pretty much noone was where they should have been.

The post Maraudaur linked will be updated when there is any new info/context to give us, we'll just have to be patient while they work this one out.

How was it broken? I went 7 wins 3 losses on my placements and it placed me in Silver 3 which is reasonable cause I was silver 4 back in season 6. This morning, I play 1 game and I win, and it places me in bronze 3? How is this fair?

You seem to have been one of the lucky players who's original placements weren't completely unreasonable it seems. Keep and eye on this post:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues-update

It's still an ongoing issue and any updates will be posted there.

43th?

You mean 43rd. you're pretty illiterate...
i cant edit the topic... thats why

I won my game and still got dropped 4 divisions. This is disrespectful.

Just dont allow the follow on of exp from preseason. You did it every OTHER fucking season. 

Theres no point grinding upto plat or gold in preseason, we knew this. 

Now your changing the rules, trying to make preseason a valid method of grinding LP.

Guess what? Noone gives a fuck. Specially not in OCE, we have smurfs and boosters in every 3rd game.

basically having a winrate of 80% in flex means your in the bottom 50% of players. HOW DOES THAT EVEN MAKE SENSE.

The top 50% above silver 4 have winrates above 80%?

OCE is full of smurfs and boosters. You cant retroactively apply this fix and expect it to sit well. You are about to face a shitstorm with a fucking teatowel as a umbrella.
I won my game and got dropped 4 divisions.
Get stuffed dragon, i had to lane vs diamonds. Then they get placed the same as me. Its a hard reset and this preseason is for fun. completely. fucked. the. pooch.

Precisely the point, you shouldn't be laning against Diamonds, you should be laning against low Gold/high Silver. It's broken, hence the fix and the ongoing updates.

UPDATE: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks
That info doesn't explain anything.  Why did I go from silver 1 60 lp to silver 3 0 lp, what was this "problem" theyve "fixed"

The problem was seeding and matchmaking being completely borked, unreliable and completely inaccurate. There were Bronze players getting placed in Plat 1 and visa versa. This change was intended to fix that but seems to have fallen short for a lot of people. We just have to be patient and wait for updates.
to be fair it took you 5 days ?

There are no rewards in preseason, you would not have received the S6 rewards, nor would you remain gold upon commencement of Season 7, because at the start of the season mmr soft resets and you have to do placements again.

EXACT same issue played already 40 games climbed from Silver 3 to gold five then i play 1 placement game and get put in bronze 2 this is utter garbage. I wasted my weekend time getting to gold in preseason only to be put in bronze off one game ......

The actual weird thing about this is oce is the only one that is rolling this out wtf ???
The timezones of OCE put us about a day ahead of most other regions, and as such we are the first to get the patches, this does not mean that OCE is the only one getting this change.
is there any point in doing flex atm? if there is going to be another reset when servers go down?

The idea of preseason is that you can raise your mmr a little for next season and get placed higher upon completion of placements, however given the dodgy going on with the new queue, I'd recommend waiting until all the seeding gets sorted out.

This 'fix' just made things a lot worse for players who've already done their placements. If you lose the correctional provisional game it drops you another handful of divisions. Was Plat, now Silver II. WP Riotards.

"Network Operations – 8:14 AM
We have rolled out a potential fix for the matchmaking issues in Ranked. If you have already placed into a League, you will need to play one additional placement game to determine your new ranking"
